text: Muhamad Guntur Triaji (born 30 July 1993) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Liga 1 club TIRA-Persikabo.Guntur Triaji ligaindonesia ==Career== Guntur was selected to represent Indonesia in 2011 through a national and regional selection process in September and October 2010. He joined TNI for the 2016 Indonesia Soccer Championship A. In the seventh week, Guntur made his first goal against Persipura Jayapura.Laporan Pertandingan: PS TNI 1–3 Persipura Jayapura ==References== ==External links== * Guntur Triaji at Liga Indonesia * Category:1993 births Category:Badak Lampung F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Lampung Category:People from Lampung Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Persiraja Banda Aceh players Category:Persija Jakarta players Category:Persela Lamongan players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Living people
title: Guntur Triaji
